name: Introspective (V1.0)
description:
Introspective is a look into the life of Doe Dearest, a young male who seems to struggle with his mental health. You play as him and make choices about what he should do to deal with his demons. 
_____________________________________________________________________________________
TRIGGER WARNING!!!

This game is 18+ due to themes of Self-Harm, Suicide, and dark themes. If any of these trigger you, you can quit at any time. Please call your national help services if you need to.

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Introspective is still in development. This was originally released as my final major project and made two weeks before the end of my final year doing Games Design & Art. I hope to make it better someday.
